title: Rules
context: [§346D-7] Rules. The department of human services shall adopt rules in accordance with chapter 91, for the purpose of this chapter. [L 1983, c 192, §9; am L 1985, c 207, pt of §1; am L 1987, c 134, pt of §1; am L 1988, c 208, pt of §3] Revision Note &ldquo;Chapter&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;Act&rdquo; pursuant to §23G-15.
